column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I frequent this place quite a bit - food is good
column2: ambiance is lively and it always provides a good time for me and my girlfiends.  It's one of those places that are fun with good food to boot.  We come here when we're in the 'hood
column3: when we're feeling like a girly gossip session or big group dinners.  Tapas just works for those occasions.  It's just...pricier and not as good as other tapas joints I've been to.  Will I be back?  Yea
